info.name: Soundcloud 3D

style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://soundcloud.com/") {
* {
font-family: century gothic!important;
}
.modal__modal, .modal__header{
transition: none;
visibility: visible;
}

.dialog{
	background: #282828;
}
::-moz-selection {
	background: #fff;
	color: #212121;
}
::selection {
	background: #fff;
	color: #212121;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar:hover,
::-webkit-scrollbar-track:hover {
background-color: rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.7);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
overflow: visible!important;
background-color: rgba(50, 50, 50, 0);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar {
width: 5px;
overflow: visible!important;
background-color: rgba(50, 50, 50, 0);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar:hover {
width: 100%!important;
background-color: rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.2);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
box-shadow: 0px 0px 60px 15px rgba(255,85,0,0.73);
background-color: #f50;
}

a.soundTitle__username:link,
a.soundTitle__title:link{
color: #cecece !important;
}
a.soundTitle__username:visited,
a.soundTitle__title:visited,
a.userBadge__userNameLink:visited{
color: rgba(0,107,179,1)!important;
}
.soundTitle__tag {/*STREAM TAG*/
background: rgba(45, 45, 45,0.7);
height: 55px;
position: absolute;
border-radius: 0!important;
right: 0;
bottom: 0;
border: none!important;
width: 10px;
margin: 0!important;
padding: 0!important;
z-index: 11!important;
box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 transparent;
}
.soundList__item:hover .soundTitle__tag {
opacity: 1!important;
height: 27px;
width: 330px;
}
.soundTitle__tagContent {
position: absolute!important;
max-width: 100%!important;
min-width: 100%!important;
text-transform: uppercase!important;
text-align: center!important;
font-size: 24px;
line-height: 24px;
color: white;
left: 0;
top: 0;
opacity: 0;
}
.soundList__item:hover .soundTitle__tagContent {
opacity: 1!important;
}
.soundContext {
display: none;
}
.soundList__item:hover .soundContext {
z-index: 11!important;
margin: 0!important;
padding: 0!important;
background: rgba(85, 85, 85,0.7);
height: 55px!important;
position: absolute!important;
/*display: block;*/
bottom: -250px!important;
max-width: 100%!important;
min-width: 100%!important;
left: 0;
}
.soundContext__usernameLink,
.soundContext__line{
top: 10%;
color: white!important;
max-width: 100%!important;
min-width: 100%!important;
margin: 0!important;
padding: 0!important;
text-transform: uppercase;
text-align: center;
font-size: 20px;
line-height: 20px;
}
.soundContext__repost{
text-transform: uppercase;
text-align: center;
font-size: 20px;
line-height: 20px;
}
.soundContext__line{
position: absolute;
}
.searchTags__tag.sc-tag.sc-tag-small{ /*SEARCH TAG*/
border-radius: 0px;
height: 20px!important;
line-height: 20px!important;
background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(51, 51, 51,1), rgba(255,0,0,0));
border: none!important;
clip-path: polygon(100% 0, 100% 80%, 55% 80%, 30% 80%, 21% 100%, 8% 100%, 0% 70%, 0 0);
}

[class="soundTitle__tag sc-tag"]{/*FULL PLAYER TAG*/
border-radius: 0px;
border: none;
text-transform: capitalize!important;
text-align: left;
text-overflow: ellipsis;
background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,0,0,0), #333333);
}
[class="soundTitle__tag sc-tag"]:before{
display: none;
}
.sc-snippet-badge.sc-snippet-badge-medium.sc-snippet-badge-grey{ /* RED PREVIEW TAG */
background: red;
border: none!important;
color: white;
}

.g-geoblocked-icon.sc-font-light{ /* Geoblocked tracks */
border-radius: 0px;
border: none!important;
color: white;
background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255, 0, 0,1), rgba(255,0,0,0));
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://soundcloud.com/") {
/*UPDATES*/

.streamExploreTabs:before{
opacity:0;
content: 'UPDATE';
text-align: center;
color: #f50;
font-size: 25px;
position: absolute;
top: -40px;
left: 25%;
width: 110px;
height: 75px;
border-right: 2px solid #f50;
animation-duration: 7s;
animation-name: UPDATES;
}
.streamExploreTabs:after{
opacity:0;
content: 'diabled like & repost animation added absolute numeration';
text-align: left;
color: rgba(0,107,179,1);
font-size: 25px;
line-height: 25px;
position: absolute;
top: -40px;
left: 35%;
width: 330px;
height: 55px;
animation-duration: 7s;
animation-name: UPDATES;
}
.streamExploreTabs:hover:before,
.streamExploreTabs:hover:after{
opacity:1
}
@keyframes UPDATES{
0%{opacity:1;}
90%{opacity:1;}
100%{opacity:0;}
}

/*UNDER*/

[href="/charts/top"]:hover:after,
[href="/discover"]:hover:after {
content: 'under construction';
position: absolute;
left: 0px;
top: 0px;
font-size: 15px;
color: #f50;
margin: 0;
}

[href="/stream"]:after {
content: ' [beta]';
left: 0px;
top: 0px;
font-size: 20px;
color: #f50;
margin: 0;
}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://soundcloud.com/") {
/*highlight*/

[href="//*[[favorite1]]*/"]:after,
[href="//*[[favorite2]]*/"]:after,
[href="//*[[favorite3]]*/"]:after {
content: '';
position: absolute;
top: -1px;
left: -1px;
width: 330px;
height: 55px;
z-index: -1;
background: rgba(0,107,179,.5);
border: 1px solid rgba(0,107,179,1);
animation: highlight 4s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes highlight{0%{opacity:0.1;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);-moz-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);}
 2%{opacity:1;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);-moz-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);}
 4%{opacity:0.1;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);-moz-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);}
 8%{opacity:1;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);-moz-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);}
 70%{opacity:0.7;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);-moz-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);}
 100%{opacity:1;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);-moz-box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(0,107,179,0.73);}
}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://soundcloud.com/") {
/*STREAM*/

/*NUMERATION*/
.soundList__item {
counter-increment: number!important;
}
.soundList__item::after {
content: counter(number)" ";
text-align: center;
color: grey;
position: absolute;
padding-right: 5px;
font-size: 13px;
width: auto;
height: 20px;
left: 0px;
background: #222;
border-radius: 0px 0px 10px 0px;
top: 0;
z-index: 1;
}
/*NUMERATION*/
.header {
right: 0;
width: 55px;
overflow: hidden;
height: 55px;
border-radius: 0px 0px 0px 10px;
}
.header:hover {
width: 100%;
border-radius: 0;
height: 45px;
}
.header__navMenuItem.selected {
font-size:0;
width: 55px;
height: 55px;
opacity: .5;
background-color: #222!important;
background: url(https://a-v2.sndcdn.com/assets/images/header/more-0e9e752.svg) 50% 50% no-repeat;
}
.header:hover .header__navMenuItem.selected {
font-size:0;
background: none;
}
.stream__list {
width: 90%;
margin: auto;
}
.soundList__item:nth-child(3n+1) {
margin: 10px;
}
.soundList__item:nth-child(3n+2) {
margin: 10px;
}
.soundList__item:nth-child(3n+3) {
margin: 10px;
}
.soundList__item {
min-width: 330px;
background: #333;
border-radius: 0;
display: block;
height: 55px;
left: 0;
float: left;
clear: none;
position: relative!important;
box-sizing: border-box;
}
.sound__body:hover{
height: 355px;
background: transparent;
z-index: 3;
animation: pulse 2s infinite;
}

@-webkit-keyframes pulse {
0% {-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0,107,179,0.8);}
70% {-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 20px rgba(0,107,179,0);}
100% {-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0,107,179,0.8);}
}
@keyframes pulse {
0% {-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0,107,179,0.8);
box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0,107,179,0.8);}
70% {-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 0 20px rgba(0,107,179,0);
box-shadow: 0 0 0 20px rgba(0,107,179,0);}
100% {-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0,107,179,0);
box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0,107,179,0);}
}
.sound.playing .sound__body:hover{
animation: pulses 2s infinite;
}

@-webkit-keyframes pulses {
0% {-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(255,85,0,0.8);}

}

.compactTrackList__item {
background: rgba(0,107,179,.6);
  vertical-align: middle;
  -webkit-transform: translateZ(0);
  transform: translateZ(0);
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
  backface-visibility: hidden;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
.compactTrackList__item:hover, .compactTrackList__item:focus, .compactTrackList__item:active {
  -webkit-animation-name: hvr-wobble-horizontal;
  animation-name: hvr-wobble-horizontal;
  -webkit-animation-duration: .5s;
  animation-duration: .5s;
  -webkit-animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;
  animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;
  -webkit-animation-iteration-count: 1;
  animation-iteration-count: 1;
}
/* Wobble Horizontal */
@-webkit-keyframes hvr-wobble-horizontal{16.65%{-webkit-transform:translateX(8px);transform:translateX(8px);}
 33.3%{-webkit-transform:translateX(-6px);transform:translateX(-6px);}
 49.95%{-webkit-transform:translateX(4px);transform:translateX(4px);}
 66.6%{-webkit-transform:translateX(-2px);transform:translateX(-2px);}
 83.25%{-webkit-transform:translateX(1px);transform:translateX(1px);}
 100%{-webkit-transform:translateX(0);transform:translateX(0);}
}
@keyframes hvr-wobble-horizontal{16.65%{-webkit-transform:translateX(8px);transform:translateX(8px);}
 33.3%{-webkit-transform:translateX(-6px);transform:translateX(-6px);}
 49.95%{-webkit-transform:translateX(4px);transform:translateX(4px);}
 66.6%{-webkit-transform:translateX(-2px);transform:translateX(-2px);}
 83.25%{-webkit-transform:translateX(1px);transform:translateX(1px);}
 100%{-webkit-transform:translateX(0);transform:translateX(0);}
}

50% {-webkit-transform: translateX(2px) rotate(1deg);

60% {-webkit-transform: translateX(-2px) rotate(-1deg);

}
.playbackSoundBadge__like.sc-button-small.sc-button-icon:before{
background-color: rgba(40,40,40,0.8)!important;
animation: none!important; 
-webkit-transform: translateZ(30px);
animation-name: heartFadeInOut; 
animation-iteration-count: infinite;
animation-duration: 2s;
}
.playControls__volume{
z-index: 5!important;
margin: 0;
padding: 0;
right: 15px;
bottom: 430%;
position: fixed!important;
height: 220px;
}
.playControls__volume:hover .volume__iconWrapper {
	-webkit-filter: brightness(3) !important;
}
.volume__speakerIcon  {
background-image: url(https://a-v2.sndcdn.com/assets/images/playback/volume-medium-4ed0236.svg);
}
.volume__sliderProgress,
.volume__sliderWrapper{
overflow: visible!important;
visibility: visible!important;
opacity: 1!important;
margin: 0;
padding: 0;
width: 30px;
height: 220px;
transition: none;
}
.playControls__volume:hover .volume__sliderProgress{
box-shadow:0px 0px 78px 4px rgba(255,85,0,0.73);
}
.volume__sliderWrapper{
background: transparent;
}
.volume__sliderBackground{
border-radius: 5px 0px 0px 5px;
overflow: visible!important;
visibility: visible!important;
opacity: 1!important;
margin: 0;
padding: 0;
left: -10px;
bottom: 5px;
width: 60px;
height: 245px;
transition: none;
background: rgba(255,85,0,0.1);
}
}
